actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a temporary exclusion of 100 percent of the gain on the sale or exchange of certain small business stock.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) increase from 50 to 100% the exclusion from gross income allowed for gain from the sale or exchange of qualified small business stock that is acquired during 2010; and (2) exempt gain from such stock in calculating the alternative minimum tax.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a temporary exclusion of 100 percent of the gain on the sale or exchange of certain small business stock.
